Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! This Retro and Exquisite pocket watch brings you back to your memory in those earlier youth memories, Elegant design with precise Quartz movement pocketwatch has an antique feel and an alluring ornament for common and social engagements.This is a very hipster, cool watch that adds a nice touch to any vintage outfit, All makes it a top classic gift choice for a birthday, Christmas, wedding or best man gift Features Elegant design with precise quartz movement Dial color in white with arabic numerals in black Retro styling case surface has light lace detailing on the front and back and looks convincingly vintage. Removable chain with a clip at the end, which is long enough to wear as a necklace or it can be used as a pocket watch Excellent workmanship and durable utilization, We are committed to delivering a wonderful usage experience. Case material: alloy Chain material: alloy Package size/Measurements: Case diameter: approx 1.8cm(4.6inch) Chain length: approx 14.8inch(40cm) Chain width: approx 0.3inch (0.7cm) Case thickness: approx 0.4 inch(1.0cm) Watch weight: approx 1.8oz(51g) Package included: 1 * Pocket watch 1 * Gift box Setting time and maintenance Press the crown at the top of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time.
